    controller  

    • Uses of Boundary in controller

      Fields in controller declared as Boundary 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Boundary Simulator.boundary 
      Constructors in controller with parameters of type Boundary 
      Constructor and Description
      ASE(Boundary boundary)
      When this class gets initialized it shows a menu to start background threads that sends commands to the weight or simulator class.
      Simulator(Boundary boundary)
      When this class gets initialized it starts a background thread that handles commands send by the ASE class.
